lead_paragraph: In this film by Nathan Silver, an unhappily married handyman is dropped into an emotional maelstrom.

headline.print_headline: Review: ‘Uncertain Terms’ Enters a Home for Pregnant Young Women

snippet: In this film by Nathan Silver, an unhappily married handyman is dropped into an emotional maelstrom.
abstract: Nicolas Rapold reviews movie Uncertain Terms, directed by Nathan Silver.
